{
    "number": 172117,
    "data": "0,1,23,86,210,415,721,1148,1716,2445,3355,4466,5798,7371,9205,11320,13736,16473,19551,22990,26810,31031,35673,40756,46300,52325,58851,65898,73486,81635,90365,99696,109648,120241,131495,143430,156066",
    "name": "a(n) = n*(n+1)*(20*n-17)/6.",
    "comment": [
        "Generated by the formula n*(n+1)*(2*d*n-2*d+3)/6 for d=10.",
        "This sequence is related to A051624 by a(n) = n*A051624(n) - Sum_{i=0..n-1}  A051624(i) = n*(n+1)*(20*n-17)/2; in fact, this is the case d=10 in the identity n*(n*(d*n-d+2)/2) - Sum_{i=0..n-1} i*(d*i-d+2)/2 = n*(n+1)*(2*d*n-2*d+3)/6. [_Bruno Berselli_, Aug 26 2010]",
        "Also, a(n) = n*A190816(n) - Sum_{i=0..n-1} A190816(i) for n>0. [_Bruno Berselli_, Dec 18 2013]",
        "Starting with offset 1, the sequence is the binomial transform of (1, 22, 41, 20, 0, 0, 0, ...). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 31 2015"
    ],
    "reference": [
        "E. Deza and M. M. Deza, Figurate numbers, World Scientific Publishing (2012), page 93. [_Bruno Berselli_, Feb 13 2014]"
    ],
    "link": [
        "Vincenzo Librandi, <a href=\"/A172117/b172117.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000</a>",
        "B. Berselli, A description of the recursive method in Comments lines: website <a href=\"http://www.lanostra-matematica.org/2008/12/sequenze-numeriche-e-procedimenti.html\">Matem@ticamente</a> (in Italian), 2008.",
        "<a href=\"/index/Rec#order_04\">Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients</a>, signature (4,-6,4,-1)."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "G.f.: x*(1+19*x)/(1-x)^4. [_Bruno Berselli_, Aug 26 2010]",
        "a(0)=0, a(1)=1, a(2)=23, a(3)=86; for n>3, a(n) = 4*a(n-1)-6*a(n-2)+4*a(n-3)-a(n-4). [_Harvey P. Dale_, May 15 2011]",
        "a(n) = Sum_{i=0..n-1} (n-i)*(20*i+1), with a(0)=0. [_Bruno Berselli_, Feb 11 2014]"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Table[(20n^3+3n^2-17n)/6,{n,0,40}] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{4,-6,4,-1},{0,1,23,86},40] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 15 2011 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(PARI) a(n)=n*(20*n^2+3*n-17)/6 \\\\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 11 2012",
        "(MAGMA) [n*(n+1)*(20*n-17)/6: n in [0..60]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 01 2015"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A051624.",
        "Cf. similar sequences listed in A237616."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,easy",
    "offset": "0,3",
    "author": "_Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 26 2010",
    "references": 4,
    "revision": 47,
    "time": "2015-08-19T18:40:47-04:00",
    "created": "2010-06-01T03:00:00-04:00"
}
